root.sql: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW V_ACC_ASS_PAY_BACK_M AS SELECT RS.GROUP_ID, --集团ID RS.HOS_ID, --医院ID RS.COPY_CODE, --账套编码 RS.PAY_NO AS BUSINESS_ID, --付款单ID RS.PAY_NO AS BUSINESS_NO, --付款单号 RS.VEN_ID SUP_ID, --供应商ID HSD.SUP_NO, --供应商变更ID HSD.SUP_CODE, --供应商编码 HSD.SUP_NAME, --供应商名称 SUM(ABD.BILL_MONEY) AS AMOUNT_MONEY, --付款金额 RS.CREATE_EMP MAKER, --制单人ID SM.USER_NAME AS MAKER_NAME, --制单人名称 RS.CREATE_DATE AS MAKE_DATE, --编制日期 RS.AUDIT_DATE AS BUSI_DATE, --业务日期 RS.AUDIT_EMP CONFIRMER, --确认人ID SF.USER_NAME AS CONFIRMER_NAME, --确认人 RS.STATE --状态 FROM ASS_BACK_PAY_MAIN RS LEFT JOIN ASS_BACK_PAY_DETAIL APD --付款明细表 ON RS.GROUP_ID=APD.GROUP_ID AND RS.HOS_ID=APD.HOS_ID AND RS.COPY_CODE=APD.COPY_CODE AND RS.PAY_NO=APD.PAY_NO LEFT JOIN ASS_BACK_BILL_MAIN ABM--发票主表 ON APD.GROUP_ID=ABM.GROUP_ID AND APD.HOS_ID=ABM.HOS_ID AND APD.COPY_CODE=ABM.COPY_CODE AND APD.BILL_NO=ABM.BILL_NO LEFT JOIN ASS_BACK_BILL_DETAIL ABD--发票明细表 ON ABM.GROUP_ID=ABD.GROUP_ID AND ABM.HOS_ID=ABD.HOS_ID AND ABM.COPY_CODE=ABD.COPY_CODE AND ABM.BILL_NO=ABD.BILL_NO LEFT JOIN HOS_SUP_DICT HSD --供应商 ON RS.GROUP_ID=HSD.GROUP_ID AND RS.HOS_ID=HSD.HOS_ID AND RS.VEN_ID=HSD.SUP_ID AND RS.VEN_NO=HSD.SUP_NO LEFT JOIN SYS_USER SM --制单人 ON RS.GROUP_ID=SM.GROUP_ID AND RS.HOS_ID=SM.HOS_ID AND RS.COPY_CODE=SM.COPY_CODE AND RS.CREATE_EMP=SM.USER_ID LEFT JOIN SYS_USER SF --确认人 ON RS.GROUP_ID=SF.GROUP_ID AND RS.HOS_ID=SF.HOS_ID AND RS.COPY_CODE=SF.COPY_CODE AND RS.AUDIT_EMP=SF.USER_ID WHERE RS.STATE=2 AND ABD.NATURS_CODE IN ('01','02','03','04') GROUP BY RS.GROUP_ID, RS.HOS_ID, RS.COPY_CODE, RS.PAY_NO, RS.PAY_NO, RS.VEN_ID, HSD.SUP_NO, HSD.SUP_CODE, HSD.SUP_NAME, RS.CREATE_EMP, SM.USER_NAME, RS.CREATE_DATE, RS.AUDIT_DATE, RS.AUDIT_EMP, SF.USER_NAME, RS.STATE

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW V_ACC_ASS_PAY_BACK_D AS SELECT RS.GROUP_ID, --集团ID RS.HOS_ID, --医院ID RS.COPY_CODE, --账套编码 RS.PAY_NO AS BUSINESS_ID, --付款单ID RS.PAY_NO AS BUSINESS_NO, --付款单号 RS.BILL_NO, --发票号 RS.BILL_MONEY, --发票金额 APS.PAY_CODE, --付款方式编码 APT.PAY_NAME, --付款方式名称 APT.PAY_TYPE, --支付属性 APA.TYPE_NAME,--支付属性名称 PS.SOURCE_ID, --资金来源ID HS.SOURCE_CODE, --资金来源编码 HS.SOURCE_NAME, --资金来源名称 HS.SOURCE_ATTR FUND_SOURCE_ATTR,--资金来源性质 HSN.NATURE_CODE AS SOURCE_NATURE_CODE, --资金来源属性 HSN.NATURE_NAME AS SOURCE_NATURE_NAME, --资金来源性质名称 APS.PAY_MONEY, --付款金额 ABD.ASS_CARD_NO, --卡片号 VC.ASS_ID, --资产ID VC.ASS_NO, --资产变更NO HDD.DEPT_ID, --管理科室ID HDD.DEPT_NO, --管理科室变更ID ATTR.OUT_CODE,--支出性质 ATD.ASS_TYPE_ID AS SUB_TYPE_ID, --分类ID ATD.ASS_TYPE_CODE, --分类编码 ATD.ASS_TYPE_NAME, --分类名称 ABD.BILL_MONEY AMOUNT_MONEY --卡片发票金额 FROM ASS_BACK_PAY_detail RS LEFT JOIN ASS_BACK_BILL_MAIN ABM--发票主表 ON RS.GROUP_ID=ABM.GROUP_ID AND RS.HOS_ID=ABM.HOS_ID AND RS.COPY_CODE=ABM.COPY_CODE AND RS.BILL_NO=ABM.BILL_NO LEFT JOIN ASS_BACK_BILL_DETAIL ABD--发票明细表 ON ABM.GROUP_ID=ABD.GROUP_ID AND ABM.HOS_ID=ABD.HOS_ID AND ABM.COPY_CODE=ABD.COPY_CODE AND ABM.BILL_NO=ABD.BILL_NO LEFT JOIN V_ACC_ASS_CARD VC --卡片视图 ON ABD.GROUP_ID=VC.GROUP_ID AND ABD.HOS_ID=VC.HOS_ID AND ABD.COPY_CODE=VC.COPY_CODE AND ABD.ASS_CARD_NO=VC.ASS_CARD_NO LEFT JOIN ASS_NO_DICT AD --资产字典 ON VC.GROUP_ID=AD.GROUP_ID AND VC.HOS_ID=AD.HOS_ID AND VC.COPY_CODE=AD.COPY_CODE AND VC.ASS_ID=AD.ASS_ID AND VC.ASS_NO=AD.ASS_NO LEFT JOIN ASS_TYPE_DICT ATD --资产分类 ON RS.GROUP_ID=ATD.GROUP_ID AND RS.HOS_ID=ATD.HOS_ID AND RS.COPY_CODE=ATD.COPY_CODE AND AD.ASS_TYPE_ID=ATD.ASS_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN ASS_BACK_PAY_STAGE APS --支付方式付款表 ON RS.GROUP_ID=APS.GROUP_ID AND RS.HOS_ID=APS.HOS_ID AND RS.COPY_CODE=APS.COPY_CODE AND RS.PAY_NO=APS.PAY_NO AND RS.BILL_NO=APS.BILL_NO LEFT JOIN ACC_PAY_TYPE APT --支付方式字典 ON APS.GROUP_ID=APT.GROUP_ID AND APS.HOS_ID=APT.HOS_ID AND APS.COPY_CODE=APT.COPY_CODE AND APS.PAY_CODE=APT.PAY_CODE LEFT JOIN ACC_PAY_ATTR APA --支付属性 ON APT.GROUP_ID=APA.GROUP_ID AND APT.HOS_ID=APA.HOS_ID AND APT.COPY_CODE=APA.COPY_CODE AND APT.PAY_TYPE=APA.PAY_TYPE LEFT JOIN ASS_PAY_SOURCE PS --对应资金来源 ON APT.GROUP_ID=PS.GROUP_ID AND APT.HOS_ID=PS.HOS_ID AND APS.COPY_CODE=PS.COPY_CODE AND APT.PAY_CODE=PS.PAY_CODE LEFT JOIN HOS_SOURCE HS --资金来源 ON PS.GROUP_ID=HS.GROUP_ID AND PS.HOS_ID=HS.HOS_ID AND PS.SOURCE_ID=HS.SOURCE_ID LEFT JOIN HOS_SOURCE_NATURE HSN --资金来源性质 ON HS.SOURCE_ATTR=HSN.NATURE_CODE LEFT JOIN HOS_DEPT_DICT HDD --领料科室 ON VC.GROUP_ID=HDD.GROUP_ID AND VC.HOS_ID=HDD.HOS_ID AND VC.DEPT_ID=HDD.DEPT_ID AND VC.DEPT_NO=HDD.DEPT_NO LEFT JOIN ACC_DEPT_ATTR ATTR --科室属性 ON HDD.DEPT_ID=ATTR.DEPT_ID AND HDD.GROUP_ID=ATTR.GROUP_ID AND HDD.HOS_ID=ATTR.HOS_ID WHERE ABD.NATURS_CODE IN ('01','02','03','04')
